Feature.Title: AEP.HQAMC.Branding Deploy Composed Look
Feature.Description: Activate to apply branding to existing sites that have never had AEP HQAMC Branding. Deploys the AEP HQAMC master page, font schema, color schema, AEP HQAMC site logo, custom css and other items for the AMC AEP Branding. When you activate this feature, AEP Branding is applied to the site collection and all subsites. Feature deactivation removes AEP Branding and applies the Seattle.master and Office composed look to all sites in the site collection. Important: Feature activation and deactivation can take several minutes, depending on how many subsites are in the site collection.
